title: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying it
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter, set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', set 'aa' as the default value and click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. [Needs more information]
OB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is not retained after modifying it. The OK button in the Edit Parameter dialog can still be used even though a default value was not set.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be retained after modifying it. After step 5, the OK button should be disabled since no default value was set.
SR: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. [Needs more information]
